summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's traffic code; amending, adding and repealing various sections and subsections in chapters 11.14, 11.22, 11.20, 11.30, 11.34, 11.40, 11.52, 11.53, 11.56, 11.57, 11.58, 11.70, 11.72, 11.74, 11.82, 11.84 and 25.08 of the Seattle Municipal Code to conform with changes in State Law.
committee: Public Safety, Human Services and Education
